nl.tudelft.jpacman.level

Class IdentifiedPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tudelft.jpacman.board.Unit
      • nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.Player
        • nl.tudelft.jpacman.level.IdentifiedPlayer

  • public class IdentifiedPlayer
extends Player
    An identified player - i.e. a player that has been logged in and therefore has a profile.
